as EIP-1167 minimal proxy via AgentFactory. Each agent clone gets      its own treasury that:      1. Receives capital via FeeSplitter pull pattern (40% growth allocation)      2. Executes DEX swaps via Uniswap V3 SwapRouter02 on Base      3. Performs buyback-and-burn on the agent's $AGENT token (deflationary flywheel)      4. Reports AUM (Assets Under Management) for leaderboard scoring      Since this is an EIP-1167 clone, it uses initialize() instead of a constructor.      The _initialized flag prevents double-initialization attacks on clones.      Access control:        - Controller (backend worker): executeSwap, executeBuybackAndBurn, setAgentToken, setTrackedToken        - Creator (deployer wallet): emergencyWithdraw, setController        - Anyone: claimGrowthETH/USDC, depositERC20, view functions, receive()      Canonical Base addresses:        - SwapRouter02: 0x2626664c2603336E57B271c5C0b26F421741e481        - WETH9:        0x4200000000000000000000000000000000000006        - USDC:         0x833589fCD6eDb6E08f4c7C32D4f71b54bdA02913","errors":{"ReentrancyGuardReentrantCall()":[{"details":"Unauthorized reentrant call."}],"SafeERC20FailedOperation(address)":[{"details":"An operation with an ERC-20 token failed."}]},"events":{"BuybackAndBurn(address,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"agentToken":"The agent token that was bought back and burned","amountBurned":"The amount of agent tokens sent to dead address","amountSpent":"The amount of input token spent on buyback"}},"ControllerUpdated(address,address)":{"params":{"newController":"The new controller address","oldController":"The previous controller address"}},"ERC20Deposited(address,address,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"The amount deposited","sender":"The address that sent the tokens","token":"The token contract address"}},"ETHDeposited(address,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"The amount of ETH deposited","sender":"The address that sent the ETH"}},"EmergencyWithdrawal(address,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"The amount withdrawn","token":"The token withdrawn (address(0) for ETH)"}},"SwapExecuted(address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"amountIn":"The amount of input token spent","amountOut":"The amount of output token received","tokenIn":"The input token address","tokenOut":"The output token address"}},"TokenTrackingUpdated(address,bool)":{"params":{"token":"The token address","tracked":"Whether the token is now tracked"}},"TreasuryInitialized(address,address,address)":{"params":{"agent":"The agent address this treasury belongs to","controller":"The backend wallet authorized to execute have approved this contract)","token":"The token contract address"}},"emergencyWithdraw()":{"details":"Only callable by the creator. Safety valve for contract migration or emergency. Wraps ETH to WETH if tokenIn is WETH and      treasury holds ETH. Used when token is deployed after treasury.","params":{"newAgentToken":"The agent's ERC-20 token address"}},"setController(address)":{"details":"Only callable by the creator or current controller","params":{"newController":"The new controller wallet address"}},"setTrackedToken(address,bool)":{"details":"Only callable by the controller. Tracked tokens appear in getTrackedBalances().","params":{"token":"The token address to track or untrack","tracked":"Whether to track (true) or untrack (false) this d3a5e31c02616964e75cfdc5049098","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://299ced486011781dc98f638059678323c03079fefae1482abaa2135b22fa92d0","dweb:/ipfs/QmbZNbcPTBxNvwChavN2kkZZs7xHhYL7mv51KrxMhsMs3j"]},"contracts/lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/ReentrancyGuard.sol":{"keccak256":"0xa516cbf1c7d15d3517c2d668601ce016c54395bf5171918a14e2686977465f53","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://1e1d079e8edfb58efd23a311e315a4807b01b5d1cf153f8fa2d0608b9dec3e99","dweb:/ipfs/QmTBExeX2SDTkn5xbk5ssbYSx7VqRp9H4Ux1CY4uQM4b9N"]},"contracts/lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/StorageSlot.sol":{"keccak256":"0xcf74f855663ce2ae00ed8352666b7935f6cddea2932fdf2c3ecd30a9b1cd0e97","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://9f660b1f351b757dfe01438e59888f31f33ded3afcf5cb5b0d9bf9aa6f320a8b","dweb:/ipfs/QmarDJ5hZEgBtCmmrVzEZWjub9769eD686jmzb2XpSU1cM"]},"contracts/lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/introspection/IERC165.sol":{"keccak256":"0x8891738ffe910f0cf2da09566928589bf5d63f4524dd734fd9cedbac3274dd5c","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://971f954442df5c2ef5b5ebf1eb245d7105d9fbacc7386ee5c796df1d45b21617","dweb:/ipfs/QmadRjHbkicwqwwh61raUEapaVEtaLMcYbQZWs9gUkgj3u"]},"contracts/src/AgentTreasury.sol":{"keccak256":"0xe91a887e58f9c09d56849a10ff63b73137410a2eae297361bde51988caedff80","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://08f43b32e1230ee3f4ff5952f520e216c5254bf15cd8f8ec3ff9a4f14d942e07","dweb:/ipfs/QmcrezrbeRTcbMh6U423NVEtwhGnyf1nYav6vgZdKpucmj"]},"contracts/src/interfaces/IAgentTreasury.sol":{"keccak256":"0xe15a6262ca3bcb33c6100890b2439aaf71ab8a096d8c5d6862ad364bcfada87f","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://e1ca22d29d3dc4f50d78542f98eab6cea9b31ebf5d966f265af30f1f774807f3","dweb:/ipfs/QmXVZQBkUcDvNACtKQgKLLAq5VF8KifdkPkeL3MF13Pwaq"]}},"version":1}

claimGrowthETH().details: Calls FeeSplitter.claimETH() to pull the 40% growth allocation

claimGrowthUSDC().details: Calls FeeSplitter.claimUSDC() to pull the 40% growth allocation

params.amount: The amount to deposit (caller must have approved this contract)

emergencyWithdraw().details: Only callable by the creator. Safety valve for contract migration or emergency.      Transfers all ETH and all tracked ERC-20 tokens to the creator address.

executeBuybackAndBurn(address,uint256,ui.details: Only callable by the controller. Swaps inputToken  agentToken via Uniswap V3,      then sends the acquired agent tokens to the dead address (0x...dEaD).

params.amountIn: The amount of input token to spend
params.amountOutMinimum: The minimum agent tokens to receive (slippage protection)
params.deadline: The unix timestamp after which the transaction reverts
params.fee: The Uniswap V3 pool fee tier for the swap
params.inputToken: The token to spend for buyback (typically WETH or USDC)

returns.amountBurned: The amount of agent tokens sent to the dead address

executeSwap((address,address,uint24,uint.details: Only callable by the controller. Wraps ETH to WETH if tokenIn is WETH and      treasury holds ETH. Uses ISwapRouter.exactInputSingle().

params.params: The swap parameters (tokenIn, tokenOut, fee, amountIn, amountOutMinimum, deadline)

returns.amountOut: The actual amount of output tokens received

returns._0: The total agent tokens sent to the dead address

returns.balances: Array of TokenBalance structs (token address + balance)

initialize(address,address,address,addre.details: Replaces constructor for EIP-1167 clone compatibility. Sets agent identity,      creator (for emergency withdrawal), and controller (for trade execution).

params.agent: The agent address this treasury belongs to
params.agentToken: The agent's $AGENT token address (for buyback-and-burn, address(0) if not yet deployed)
params.controller: The backend worker wallet (trade execution authority)
params.creator: The creator wallet (emergency withdrawal authority)
params.feeSplitter: The FeeSplitter contract to claim growth capital from

setAgentToken(address).details: Only callable by the controller. Used when token is deployed after treasury.

setController(address).details: Only callable by the creator or current controller

setTrackedToken(address,bool).details: Only callable by the controller. Tracked tokens appear in getTrackedBalances().

params.token: The token address to track or untrack
params.tracked: Whether to track (true) or untrack (false) this token

BURN_ADDRESS().notice: The dead address used for token burns

MAX_TRACKED_TOKENS().notice: Maximum number of tracked tokens (gas safety for getTrackedBalances loop)

agent().notice: The agent address this treasury belongs to

agentToken().notice: The agent's $AGENT token for buyback-and-burn (can be set post-deploy)

claimGrowthETH().notice: Claim accumulated ETH from the FeeSplitter (pull pattern)

claimGrowthUSDC().notice: Claim accumulated USDC from the FeeSplitter (pull pattern)

controller().notice: The backend worker wallet (trade execution authority)

depositERC20(address,uint256).notice: Deposit ERC-20 tokens into the treasury

emergencyWithdraw().notice: Emergency withdrawal of all assets to the creator

executeBuybackAndBurn(address,uint256,ui.notice: Execute buyback-and-burn on the agent's $AGENT token

executeSwap((address,address,uint24,uint.notice: Execute a single-hop swap on Uniswap V3

feeSplitter().notice: The FeeSplitter contract to claim growth capital from

getTotalBurnedAmount().notice: Get the cumulative amount of agent tokens burned

getTotalBurns().notice: Get the total number of buyback-and-burn events executed

getTrackedBalances().notice: Get all tracked token balances held by this treasury

initialize(address,address,address,addre.notice: Initialize the treasury for a specific agent (called once by factory)

setAgentToken(address).notice: Set the agent's $AGENT token address (for buyback-and-burn)

setTrackedToken(address,bool).notice: Add or remove a token from AUM tracking
